name: SlideRow
description:
First in this play-style! Match three meets old “15 game”.

Unique gameplay, 10 main levels to complete and 4 endless game modes to play if you finished main levels. Chill music and fun gameplay, also you got 3 abilities to help you out! 
Feel free to rate, comment etc. Feedback is very appreciated!

Features:
* 10 Different levels to complete
* 4 Endless levels
* Pixel-art style game
* Unique game-play
* Enjoyable music
* 3 different abilities to use
* Gems to buy abilities

NOTE: This application is ad-supported. Ads are shown only on lose and when you are pressing “Add Moves” button. Also you can remove ads when buying anything! (Min of 1$).

Feel free to contact me with ideas and etc.

Follow on Twitter:
@Askariot2

Or visit online on Itch.io:
https://askariot.itch.io/

PlayMarket Link:  
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Ask.SlideRow

Enjoy!
